app.title: WebAPI Starter
app.description: A comprehensive WebAPI Starter application with CRUD operations and API token authentication

users.password_too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters long

landing.title: WebAPI Starter Template
landing.subtitle: Your Web API Project Foundation
landing.description: A ready-to-use starter template for building professional web APIs with modern Python frameworks. Clone this project and start building immediately with pre-configured authentication, admin dashboard, user management, CRUD operations, and comprehensive documentation - all the boilerplate code you need to launch your next web application.
landing.footer_text: Your foundation for building modern web APIs.
landing.admin_panel_desc: Pre-built administration interface for managing users, items, and system monitoring. Includes role-based access control and beautiful responsive design - ready to customize for your specific needs.
landing.framework_desc: Built on modern Python frameworks with all the best practices pre-configured. Async/await patterns, automatic validation, and high performance - perfect starting point for scalable APIs.
landing.auth_system_desc: Complete authentication system with JWT tokens, password hashing, session management, and role-based permissions - no need to build authentication from scratch.
landing.crud_desc: Pre-implemented Create, Read, Update, Delete operations with database models, validation, and error handling. Use as-is or extend for your custom data types.
landing.api_structure_desc: Well-organized project structure with automatic OpenAPI documentation, CORS configuration, and standardized response patterns - follow the established patterns for consistency.
landing.ui_templates_desc: Professional responsive HTML templates for forms, dashboards, and user interfaces. Easily customizable with modern CSS - perfect starting point for your frontend.
